The City of Clarksville has instituted a **mass communication system** to send emergency alerts and other important news and notifications. Subscribers can register to receive alerts via phone call, text message, and/or email by signing up [here](https://clarksville-tx.myfreealerts.com/)

Contact
=======

### City of Clarksville (8 to 5 Monday thru Friday) 800 West Main Street Clarksville, TX 75426

903-427-3834 City Hall  
Utility Billing ext 253  
City Secretary ext 255  
Municipal Court ext 256  
EDC ext 257  
Code Compliance ext 258  
Finance ext 259  
Mayor ext 260  
City Manager ext 261  
Non-Emergency Fire ext 233

City Hall Fax 903-427-3907

Animal Control **Business Hours** 903-427-3834  **After Hours** 903-609-2166

Non-Emergency Police Dispatch **Business Hours** 903-427-3834 **After Hours** 430-900-8821  
Police **Business Hours** 903-427-3834 **After Hours** 430-900-8821  
Police Fax:  903-427-2913

### Notices

**Texas Community Development Block Grant Program**

The City of Clarksville is giving notice of the City’s intent to submit a Texas Community Development Block Grant Program grant application for a Community Development Fund grant request of $350,000 for reconstruction and drainage improvements for portions of North Pecan Street and South Delaware Street in the City of Clarksville. The application is available for review at Clarksville City Hall during regular business hours. *Para obtener una copia en español, comuníquese con la secretaria de la ciudad al 903-427-3834.*

### Mass Communication

The City of Clarksville has instituted a mass communication system to send emergency alerts and other important news and notifications. Subscribers can register to receive alerts via phone call, text message, and/or email by signing up [here](https://clarksville-tx.myfreealerts.com/)
